name: JDFixer
description:
This mod allows you to change the spawn offset of any map at will to a desired jump distance. Features also include setting the jump distance to the map's default or to a configurable reaction time.

This is a port of the PC mod with the same name, created by Zephyr: https://discord.com/channels/441805394323439646/889894313763422218/895936512938623056
If you find any bugs, please let me know.
author: Metalit
